I came across <a href="https://interaktiv.morgenpost.de/berlin-marathon-2017/">this cool piece</a> of data vizualization from the folks of Berliner Morgenpost. I thought it would be nice to re-create the whole visualization for the Hamburg Marathon 2018. I came up with a complete R-based solution.

![](/post/2018-05-22-marathon-hamburg_files/marathon.gif)

I also analyzed the gender differences.

![](/post/2018-05-22-marathon-hamburg_files/marathon_gender.gif)

You can fine the code on <a href="https://github.com/kruse-alex/marathon">my Github</a>.
